scripts.dev: docker buildx bake dev --load && docker compose up dev
scripts.predev:local: node -e "const net = require('net'); const s = net.createServer(); s.once('error', () => { console.error('\nPort 5173 is already in use. Run: lsof -ti:5173 | xargs kill\n'); process.exit(1); }); s.listen(5173, () => s.close());"
scripts.build: docker buildx bake build --load && docker compose run --rm build
scripts.lint: docker buildx bake lint --load && docker compose run --rm lint
scripts.test: docker buildx bake test --load && docker compose run --rm test
scripts.test:coverage: docker buildx bake test --load && docker compose run --rm test -- --coverage
scripts.typecheck: docker buildx bake typecheck --load && docker compose run --rm typecheck
scripts.typecheck:local: bun run --cwd apps/desktop typecheck && bun run --cwd packages/shared typecheck
scripts.prepare: if [ -d .git ]; then lefthook install; else echo 'Skipping lefthook install (no .git)'; fi
